news.title: New Action RPG Released: The Legend of Storms
news.author: Jane Doe
news.content: The highly anticipated action RPG, 'The Legend of Storms', has officially launched today. Developed by StormTech Studios, this game promises an immersive open-world experience with stunning graphics and a deep storyline.

news.title: Top 5 Upcoming PC Games in 2025
news.author: John Smith
news.content: From expansive RPGs to intense shooters, the year 2025 is set to bring some of the best PC games yet. Here are the top 5 titles to look forward to: 'Eclipse', 'Battlefront Reborn', 'Chrono Wars', 'Nova Odyssey', and 'Vanguard Siege'.

news.title: Gaming Industry Faces Setbacks in 2025 Due to Global Chip Shortage
news.author: Emily Brown
news.content: The global semiconductor chip shortage continues to disrupt the gaming industry, delaying hardware releases and affecting game production. Experts suggest that the situation may improve by mid-2025, but the impact is still felt globally.

news.title: Beta versions of upcoming AAA Games
news.author: john Bron
news.content: It's a two days of the launched of the GTA6 Beta-version
